column1: Review

I use it and it shows your skin glow but your skin still dry. If you go to sleep which I did because I used after bathe at night. I woke up with all my pillow lines in my face. My face usually feels humectant, but this time feels dry even it look humectant but with line of expressions. I use it 3 more times, it smells pire chemicals. If you open your mouth to breath it taste like perfume or deodorant. I decided to return it qnd they send me another one. Of course I don‚Äôt want to look older so I returned both. The refund process takes ONE MONTH and Half, yes, 45 days plus with a note saying they will charge you according with the amount you used it or the condition of the return and add 7 more days foe your bank make available the money. Definitely I can tell they use cheap product and make an effort to look it nice. I returned to my Japanese skin care.

If you are someone who regularly purges when trying a new product, know that this product will cause a terrible purge. I used this multiple times a day for two days, and by the third day, my face was full of red acne, which was very painful. I discontinued use of this product and all of my acne went away. I would not recommend it if you have a similar oily skin type that is sensitive to new products. It was a good deal, though.

I tried so hard to like thus spray but unfortunately it irritated my forehead to the point that it was peeling. It also clogged my pores a lot and I broke out and I am not one to break out like that, never really have and I am almost 42 years old. I was convinced it was the spray because it was the only new thing on my face. Unfortunately I will not be purchasing this spray again.

This serum has artificial fragrance and therefore it is not suitable for sensitive or acne prone skin..the fragrance will disrupt your natural ph and skin barrier, so no matter how many good ingredients are in there,  it all goes down the drain once the fragrance is added.

First off I want to say I don‚Äôt have sensitive skin. This stuff burnt around my eyes so bad that they were swollen. It also has a very strong smell like an old grandma. I wouldn‚Äôt ever use this again.

I received the product and use it. It has a beautiful smell but it is not Dewey whatsoever. It is sticky and tacky and it leaves no glow. The only reason I purchased the product is because of the Beautiful Dewey glow that it says in the advertisement. It does not work that way, there  is no shine, no do, no glow. Just sticky skin. Do not recommend

Believed the hype and bought a bottle. Felt awful when reading the box that it‚Äôs ‚Äúrigorously tested‚Äù for human skin which implies animal cruelty. No cruelty free badge on product. This is also VERY heavily perfumed/floral fragrance.

I was excited when the product arrived at my doorstep.  So I tried it on my wrist first in case the product would irritate my skin. It was a nice spray application and the texture felt silky, however.... the smell!  It is a cross between wet leaves and foot odor... This is definitely going back! I couldn't imagine misting my whole face with it!
Save your money, this spray/ serum is not worth the hype at all. It almost has a burning feeling on your face and leaves you sticky and tacky.

After reading great reviews and watching many videos on youtube I decided to give it a try. I must be allergic to any ingredient that it contains, almost my full face had an allergic reaction to it. It burned and even it still hurts after I stopped using it.

This smells so bad! It also does not moisturize at all. Didn‚Äôt do a thing for my face and I use it twice a day and have since I bought it. I truly can‚Äôt believe the scent of this stuff. It‚Äôs horrendous. Would never buy again.

I used six pumps and it still didn‚Äôt hydrate my skin.  Yes, it looks shiny at first but then it evaporates.  I‚Äôve even tried reapplying it and my skin feels tight and dry within 15 minutes (just as if I sprayed plain water on it).Quite disappointed in the quality of this product.  Don‚Äôt waste your money.Checked on several of the 5 star reviews and they only reviewed this one product. Quite suspicious.
As soon  as  I spray my face with this product  started itching  and burning. This product is not  suitable for people with sensitive skin. You need to do test before you apply this product.
I broke out so badly with this product that I was shocked my face looked like I was going thru puberty. I threw it away.
No lo recomiendo para pieles sensibles me dio alergia de inmediato decepcionada por que ten√≠a buenas expectativas del producto.

This spray has a very strong, cheap, dime store perfume scent. The odor upsets my stomach and gives me sneezing fits.As well, my face becomes bright red and irritated post spray. I look like I have a severe sunburn.I notice that my eyes become very dry after using this product. So much so that I require lubricating eye drops, which I rarely use.There's a metallic shimmer to this spray that concerns me. None of my skin care products include metals. So odd.If you do use this spray I would advise caution. This seems to be a very harsh product.
El suero me lleg√≥  por la mitad del frasco y deteriorada la etiqueta
During the inital spray it appears it'll hydrate your skin. Within seconds it feels like you have used rubbing alcohol all over your face.

First of all the seller shipped item very fast and was in great condition so that should be known. The product itself however was awful though. Smell does NOT dissipate like others mentioned, it lingers on the skin so long and it‚Äôs not pleasant, its very strong and smells like a heavy older perfume. If you‚Äôre sensitive to smells please pass on this. I couldn‚Äôt get past it, smells synthetic with a mix of some type of essential oils. I‚Äôm glad I first tried it on my hand and didn‚Äôt spray on my face. Sadly, I can‚Äôt mention anything about the skincare benefits bc I couldn‚Äôt get past the smell. I will be returning.

This smells aweful. Like cheap old lady dime store perfume. Spraying it on your face means you keep smelling it. I tried it once and can't do it again. It DOES NOT smell nice and citrusy as described.

I wanted to love this like everyone else but I don‚Äôt. The scent is a very strong perfume-y chemical type scent first off, so if you‚Äôre sensitive to that don‚Äôt buy this! Also, I tried it as soon as I got it, excited about it, and shortly after spraying on my face I started experiencing a burning sensation. I wouldn‚Äôt say I have sensitive skin so I‚Äôm not sure what was happening with that. I washed it off shortly after feeling the burning and I‚Äôm hoping it doesn‚Äôt continue to affect my skin. I also felt a tightness like it was more drying than hydrating. Needless to say I‚Äôm returning the product.
The spray serum is not suitable to my skin type , and I had allergic signs after 2 days of using it.
I heard about how amazing this product is. The main issue is that it‚Äôs scented and the scent is of an old lady perfume. Which doesn‚Äôt dissipate! So, I am returning it. Too bad!
When I received the box it was already opened. The bottle was 25% used up.  Never ordered again.
I couldn‚Äôt try it because of ingredients
I thought this was a good product but after a few uses my eyes broke out in hives. I have pretty sensitive skin but I thought this would be fine. I guess not.

I don't know if that only happened to me but it's my experience with the product. For oily or combination skin I don't recommend it very much since it is more prone to acne.
deff not worth the price, product does nothing

Not as expected

Watched many videos and thought I picked a winner. Have been using for 5 days and haven‚Äôt noticed any difference at all. My forehead looks greasy not glowing. The rest of my face looks the same. Won‚Äôt be purchasing again. Bummer

I admit I got sucked into all the reviews. It gives a glowy look. But all accentuates wrinkles and pores. I'm thinking if your 20 and want a glowy look this would be good. But not at 40 looking g for moisture. Also I try and do fragrance free. This does have a fragrance it's ok. It burnedmy eyes even closing them so I tried to just spray in my hand which didn't work because it's not really an oil.

Definitely don‚Äôt think it is worth what it cost. Overrated in my opinion. Gave it one star because you do have a slight glow. Lastly, the scent‚Ä¶ no good.

This product does not give your skin enough moisture. It's not ideal for mature skin. It does not have anti-aging properties. I have used many other serum/oils sprays that are much better than this.
The product is great, except for the fact that is heavily scented.  It smells lovely. However, I do not want the smell to consume my day. I wish the product was unscented.
Spray didn‚Äôt work out for me unfortunately. Broke out all over and caused redness and no shine. I don‚Äôt recommend

I am not a fan.I‚Äôve mixed my own water/oil sprays, which have worked far better for me and are customized to my needs. But I thought I‚Äôd give this a try. I‚Äôm going to keep making my own hydrating sprays and return this one. It certainly wasn‚Äôt worth the discounted ($18) price tag.
The media could not be loaded.A quarter of the product is  spilled
Very watery don't buy!
Only reason I give 1 star it made my face itch so much and tasted so bad! Since it is a mist it is bound to get in your mouth. I can see it being a great item but just not for me.

After applying the product my faces is glossy because of the water in the product but as soon as the product absorbs my face feels dry. I was hoping this product was good but unfortunately I don‚Äôt recommended.

I do want to support small companies but  sometimes they think they‚Äôre so greater than famous existing companies and priced themselves too high. No me gust√≥, desde que lo comence a usar me salio granos alrededor de todo el labio de abajo, no es lo que esperaba no lo recomiendo, no es nada grandioso como dicen ,no vale la pena
